page.title: 14'THE SEASONS'
page.content: {The Seasons}is a health food shop in the village of Forest Row.It has a strong {Anthroposophical}bias in that most of the produce is grown locally by farmers who are sympathic to the aims of the anthroposophical movement. All the {vegetables}are grown { {biodynamically}which means that the use of chemical fertilizers and modern pesticides is strongly discouraged. Milk and dairy products are sold fresh from{Plaw Hatch Farm}where even the cows are treated with alternative medicines.The success of this shop is obvious as it has expanded rapidly over recent years.It now sells {wooden {toys,}Anthroposophical books and stationery from recycled paper. All the bread and confectionery is from the local bakery who only uses the flour from wheat that has been grown biodynamically.
